'''Wenut''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], [[Sumeru]].

In certain areas of the Desert of Hadramaveth, Wenut will emerge from the ground to attack the player, dealing {{Color|AoE True Physical DMG}}. The player can manipulate the location of the Wenut's attacks to destroy [[Weathered Rock]]s.

==Trivia==
* Today, the Wenut population is at least in the double-digits.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Culling of the Worms: Demonstration}}</ref>
* "High-end spices" can be extracted from the body fat of Wenut.<ref>{{Ref/Item|Sand Grease Pupa}}</ref>
** Due to their similar fat composition, some scammers will grind [[Sand Grease Pupa]]e and pass them off as spices extracted from Wenut.
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|Wenut|egy=<span style="position:relative; bottom:.3em;">𓃹</span><span style="position:relative; margin-left:-.8em;">𓈖</span><span style="position:relative; bottom:.3em;">𓏌</span><span style="position:relative; margin-left:-.35em;">𓏏</span>𓆗 wnwt|egy_rm=wenut}}, also known as {{w|Unut}}, is a prehistoric Egyptian snake goddess.
